channel.title: Corp and Tormented Demons dont attack [PI]
channel.description: My corp and tormented demons arent attackable they can attack you but you cant attack them back i remember fixing this but i forgot where the old post for the fix is so if someone can just give me the fix for it i know its something to do with the npchandler or spawn-config just give me what to do snippet ill be fine.

item.title: Corp and Tormented Demons dont attack [PI]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Add the npc’s into npc.cfg because the npc doesn’t have a set hp level or combat level.

Read full topic
item.source: Corp and Tormented Demons dont attack [PI]
